scripts.dev:unix: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,green "cd Frontend && bun run dev" "cd BackendM && ./gradlew bootRun"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,green "cd Frontend && bun run dev" "cd BackendM && gradlew.bat bootRun"
scripts.dev: bash -c "if [[ $OS == 'Windows_NT' ]]; then bun run dev:win; else bun run dev:unix; fi"
